entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
